name: Self Indulgence in 3 dimesnions
description:
A thought provoking and expertly-crafted exploration of interactivity and self-introspection through the medium of rocket-propelled first-person platforming. Liberate your senses and take flight, interacting with innovative game mechanics such as opening doors with switches.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interact: Space
  • Hover: Right Click
  • Rocket: Left Click
  • Quit: U

Background Music (Space Vacuum - A Cinematic Journey) by NaturesEye

Seinfield theme (ending) by Sponge Magic
